about_the_game:
Information

Endless car chase is a fast retro style paced game in which you must collect money and avoid the cops! The game supports Windows, Mac, Linux. It can be played with the keyboard, gamepad. Buy and control a cars or motorbikes. Listen to retro music and don't get caught by the cops!


Mini plot

After 30 years, you come back to Retro City, the cops are waiting for You (when you were young, You wanted to rent a VHS cassette, but you had no money, so you stole it. Cops remember this). What you can do is turn your favorite Radio Flashback Retro FM and pedal to the metal.


Game features

  • 50 vehicles to unlock (sports cars, motorbikes, jeeps, vans, etc.).
  • Buy monster truck and smash police vehicles
  • Steam leaderboards
  • 100 Steam achievements
  • Retro music with vocals (by Alex Dew)
  • Flashback FM radio
  • Police AI has different settings: smart (can avoid obstacles etc.), stupid, crazy, kamikaze
  • The game looks like a GIF from Windows 95
  • RTX 3080 ti 400-500 FPS
  • During the chase you find that your brake doesn't work, you can only drive forward
  • Simple game play and gameplay
  • GIF + aesthetics + summer edition
  • Buy retro cars, bikes
  • 91 languages
  • Legendary title game over "WASTED"
  • Collect additional items (money, repair, etc.).
  • Steam achievements, Play remote TV, Steam Cloud
  • Top scores
  • Windows, macOS, Linux
  • Hot Price
  • Endless gameplay

reviews:
“A classic driving and arrest themed game of driving different vehicles, using obstacles to kill different police cars in a frenzy, avoiding car crashes, trying to improve your scores and take your place on the leaderboard. The game is simple and fanciful Unique world style and emotional BGM combined with simple gameplay can make players feel the joy of the game in a very short time. It is suitable for rest and relaxation when time is not enough”
月骨星魂
